script:
A heartwarming short film about two friends meeting up for a bike ride.

Use the attached image as character references - these are the two main characters who will appear throughout the video.

Structure:
- 0-8s: Establishing shot of Central Park on a sunny day, one character waits by a bench
- 8-14s: The second character arrives, they greet each other warmly
- 14-22s: They hop on bikes and ride through the park paths together, laughing
- 22-30s: They find a perfect spot, lay out a blanket, and enjoy a picnic together

Dialogue:
CHARACTER_1: "Beautiful day for a ride!"
CHARACTER_2: "I brought sandwiches!"
CHARACTER_1: "This is perfect."
music_style: upbeat acoustic folk, happy and carefree, gentle guitar, warm summer vibes
visual_style: Bright sunny day in Central Park NYC, warm golden hour lighting, lush green trees, cheerful and wholesome aesthetic, the two characters from the reference image should appear consistently throughout
title: Picnic in the Park
